title: How to find the melting point of a compound made from four substances - Quora

response.answer_text: You propose a non sequitur. PURE substances have characteristic melting points. And OFTEN this melting point, and the melting points of its derivatives, can identify a substance unequivocally… On the other hand, an impure, or mixed substance, will have a melting point range …and this cannot really aid in identification… You must separate, SOMEHOW, the mixture into its components…
You need to heat it up and observe when it melts. Unfortunately one need to know specific substances to tell at what temperature its mixture melts.
